description: BaliCoin be used as a mean of payment in the tourism industry, for example for hotel bookings, ticket reservations, car rentals and other tourism facilities. BaliCoin is an open source cryptocurrency, using advanced Ethereum blockchain technology.With BaliCoin your money will be stored in your personal wallet, strictly confidential and absolutely private. In doing the transaction, money from the sending account will be transfered directly to the recipient, not through any intermediaries. BaliCoin is based on Ethereum ERC20 platform coin, which has the potential to become the biggest smart contract system in the world for travel and tourism market. TeamBaliCoin confidently innovate this capacity through the enabled BaliCoin eco system.
name: Bali
